branchCategory.name: Modular
branchCategory.description: <P>Series AL modular style lubricators provide accurate lubrication of downstream equipment. The oil drop rate is adjustable depending on equipment requirements. The modular AL design allows connection with other SMC air preparation equipment. <FONT color=#ff0000>The current AL series is no longer being produced and is subject to available quantities only. Please utilize the new AL10~60-A series for your product design.</FONT></P>

branchItem.description: <P>Series AL modular style lubricators provide accurate lubrication of downstream equipment. The oil drop rate is adjustable depending on equipment requirements. The modular AL design allows connection with other SMC air preparation equipment. </P>
